channel.title: UI on UAsset Browser
channel.description: Recent content in UI on UAsset Browser

item.title: Layout
item.description: Folder Tree Folder Tree (or Source Tree) is a hierarchical representation of all the folders you added. Asset View Content of selected folder will be displayed in the Asset View. Search and Filter Search and filter usset files by name / type or any asset registry tags. UAsset Toolbar Toobar buttons with actions can be performed on selected uasset files. Dependency Viewer Display dependency graphy of selected uasset file.

item.title: Folder Tree
item.description: Folder Tree (or Source Tree) is a hierarchical representation of all the folders you added in the UAsset Browser. Add Root Content Folder To add a root content folder to folder tree: Click Add button Select a folder from file system The Content folder of a unreal project or Vault Cache data is prefered. The folder you selected will be added to the folder tree

item.title: Asset View
item.description: Asset View display all uasset files within a folder. Overview Select a folder in Folder Tree to display assets inside the folder. Use Ctrl + Mouse Wheel or Thumbnail Scale Slider to change the scale of the asset thumbnails. Mouse hover the asset thumbnail to view asset meta datas. Options View Type Tiles Switch to tile view. List Switch to list view. Columns

item.title: Dependency Viewer
item.description: Dependency Viewer display a grpah of uasset files that been referenced by current selected asset. Toggle Tree Panel Click the Dependency Viewer button beside the search bar on Asset View to toggle the display of Dependency Viewer. Display Depencency Graph for Selected Asset To display depencency graph for selected asset, makre sure Dependency Viewer is toggled on, then select the asset in Asset View, the dependency graph will be displayed in Dependency Viewer.

item.title: Validate
item.description: Validation Status Overlay Make sure Show Validation Status Overlay option is on in Asset View’s View Options. A small icon will be displayed as overlay on asset thumbnail to indiate asset’s validation status. There’re 4 validation status: Unknown The asset has not been validated. The status is unknown. Valid The asset has been validated and considered valid. A valid asset can be imported into current project. Invalid The asset has been validated and considered invalid.

item.title: Import
item.description: Import Selected Assets To import selected uasset files, select them in the Asset View, then click Import or Flat Import button on the toolbar. Or you can right click on the selected uasset files, select Import or Flat Import from the conext menu. Import Options Click on the pull down button beside Import button to access Import Options. Basic Import Options Abort If Dependency Missing Abort import task if any dependency of the uasset file is missing.
